articles.title: CPRK Hits S. Korean Regime for Anti-DPRK Campaign over Attack on U.S. Ambassador
articles.content:
CPRK Hits S. Korean Regime for Anti-DPRK Campaign over Attack on U.S. Ambassador
Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Lippert, U.S. ambassador to south Korea, was reportedly attacked by a south Korean resident in the heart of Seoul on March 5.
					 South Korea witnessed fierce anti-U.S. actions in the past, but it is the first time that the American ambassador, governor-general of the U.S. colony, suffered a knife-wielding attack.
					
					 In this regard, the Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) issued its information bulletin No. 1085 Saturday.
					
					 The attack is a reflection of the south Korean people's mindset against the U.S. fanning up a war crisis on the Korean Peninsula through dangerous joint military drills in south Korea, and an expression of their resistance to it, the bulletin says, adding:
					
					 What matters is that the south Korean puppet regime is branding the attack as an "act by the forces following the north" in a desperate attempt to link the case with the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK reported about the case, regarding it as a punishment to the U.S. by justice and an expression of the people's mindset against it. However, the puppet regime criticized this report as "support for terrorism," "distortion of the truth about the case" and "senseless remarks self-admitting that it is a group of terrorists and human rights violators."
					
					 Even the police and conservative media of south Korea joined the regime in attempting to link the case with the DPRK. They claimed that the attacker visited the DPRK in the past and that it welcomed him when he made a brick attack on the Japanese ambassador. Meanwhile, the regime let old ultra-right conservatives defame the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership and its flag, creating a terror-ridden atmosphere.
					
					 Such moves are prompted by a vicious intention to save itself from the present awkward position and eliminate the pro-reunification patriotic forces with the case as a momentum and intensify an anti-DPRK smear campaign worldwide.
					
					 In particular the south Korean regime's ulterior intention is to egg its American master on to re-list the DPRK as a "sponsor of terrorism" and strengthen the collusion with the U.S. and the international cooperation against the DPRK.
					
					 To incriminate its resident protesting the U.S. keen on war exercises will only show the true colors of the south Korean regime as the special-class sycophant and traitor more clearly.

articles.title: DPRK Government Economic Delegation Returns Home
articles.content:
DPRK Government Economic Delegation Returns Home
Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- A DPRK government economic delegation led by Ri Ryong Nam, minister of External Economic Relations, returned home on Saturday after visiting Russia.

articles.title: Women in DPRK under Deep Loving Care of Supreme Leader
articles.content:
Women in DPRK under Deep Loving Care of Supreme Leader
Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Greeting the 105th anniversary of the March 8 International Women's Day, the Korean women are looking back with deep emotion on the profound loving care shown by supreme leader Kim Jong Un and his noble outlook on loving and respecting them, carrying forward the ennobling intentions and warm hearts of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Kim Jong Un attended a grand concert held to mark the March 8 International Women's Day in Juche 101 (2012) and extended his warm greetings to all women across the country who were dedicating themselves to the prosperity of the country and the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 He guided a flight drill of women pursuit fighter pilots of the Air and Anti-Air Force of the Korean People's Army in November, 2014 and highly appreciated the noble revolutionary spirit of them who chose the difficult course of life with true love for the country.
					
					 Considering the feelings of service women of the Kamnamu company of the Korean People's Army reluctant to bid farewell to him, he invited them one by one to stand by his side to have a photo taken. Not forgetting a promise made to a woman pilot, he personally named a child at the venue of the 1st Meeting of Airpersons of the KPA. These legends are recorded in the history of long journeys for Songun revolution.
					
					 He made sure that the 4th National Meeting of Mothers was held on the occasion of the Mother's Day in the first year in the century of Juche.
					
					 He in a speech made at the Second Meeting of KPA Exemplary Servicemen's Families in December, 2014 said that servicemen's families were taking warm care of their husbands and the sweat shed by them with clean conscience for the prosperity of the country, without being known to others, help accelerate the advance of the Korean revolution like blood for it. He highly praised them for being reliable assistants to their husbands in the revolution and eternal cooks for the Korean revolution.
					
					 He has shown all sorts of loving care for the women, sparing nothing for them.
					
					 He represents the care of the great sun as he is providing the women with the most worthwhile and dignified life and happiness in the world, projecting them as flowers of families, society and the country.

articles.title: Bus Service to Masikryong Ski Resort Begins in DPRK
articles.content:
Bus Service to Masikryong Ski Resort Begins in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- A regular bus service for visitors to the Masikryong Ski Resort began in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea in January. The ski resort is located in a mountainous area of the country's Kangwon Province.
					 The tourist buses run between the capital city of Pyongyang and Masikryong and between Wonsan City and Masikryong once in two days.

articles.title: Nano Lubricant Additive Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Nano Lubricant Additive Developed in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- The State Nano-technology Bureau of the DPRK has recently developed a new kind of nano lubricant additive for restoring friction surface.
					 This energy-saving additive prevents the abrasion of rotary parts of vehicles and machines or restores them.
					
					 The additive, with multi-functional effect, helps lengthen the serviceable life of motors twice and that of lubricant thrice and raise the engine efficiency while reducing the consumption of lubricant 50~70% and fuel 5~10%. It also reduces the emission of exhaust fumes.
					
					 The new additive is applicable to all kinds of machines using lubricant or grease.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls on Women to Demonstrate Their Revolutionary Spirit in Building of Thriving Nation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls on Women to Demonstrate Their Revolutionary Spirit in Building of Thriving Nation
Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il published his work "Women Are a Dynamic Force Pushing Ahead with the Revolution and Construction" on March 8, Juche 84 (1995).
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday dedicates an article to the anniversary of the work.
					
					 The article notes:
					
					 The past 20 years since the publication of the work were a significant period in which the Korean women's status and role as a strong force for building a thriving nation have been remarkably enhanced and their beautiful traits and revolutionary spirit have been demonstrated before the whole world under the energetic leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					
					 A great heyday has now been ushered in the Juche-based women's movement of the DPRK under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The tradition of remaining loyal to the leader and devotedly protecting him that started in Mt. Paektu has been fully displayed in the on-going advance toward the final victory in building a thriving nation.
					
					 The country never forgets the Korean women who took care of their families, cells of society, cheerfully weathering all difficulties during the period of the hardest Arduous March and forced march, and have brought up children to be reliable pillars with warm love. The staunch spirit and great enthusiasm and total dedication of the Korean women have always been a source of dynamism filling the whole society with fragrance of beautiful life. It was thanks to the women who dedicated themselves to the society, collective and the great socialist family that the country could have advanced with dynamism despite all hardships and ordeals.
					
					 The WPK has reposed deep trust in the women as they are playing a great role in the drive for bringing earlier the great prosperity of the country.
					
					 The article calls on all Korean women to powerfully demonstrate their revolutionary mettle in the general advance for building a thriving nation, single-mindedly united around Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Sexual Abuses Patronized by Upper Echelon of South Korean Military
articles.content:
Sexual Abuses Patronized by Upper Echelon of South Korean Military
Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Sexual abuses are rampant in the south Korean puppet army. This is the inevitable result of the military bosses' contempt for women. 
					 At round-table talks sponsored by a joint fact-finding team on the sexual abuse committed by a brigade commander of the puppet army recently, the chief inspector of the puppet army headquarters who was heading the team, shielded the perpetrator, passing the buck for the crime to the service woman who fell victim to the sexual assault, according to Kyunghyang Daily News on Feb. 23. 
					
					 A vice division commander treated the service women like criminals, making a malignant accusation against them. 
					
					 On March 5 the commander of the 1st Corps, addressing a meeting of leading officers of the army which handled the case of a colonel of the puppet army who habitually perpetrated sexual abuses against the service woman under his command, raised the question as to why service women didn't clearly express their objection, stunning the public. 
					
					 The south Korean military authorities had better put under control what is happening in the army, cesspool of sexual abuses, to begin with.

articles.title: Animal Diseases Serious in S. Korea
articles.content:
Animal Diseases Serious in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Foot-and-mouth disease and bird flu are rapidly spreading in south Korea, causing big losses, according to the south Korean KBS and CBS.
					 The foot-and-mouth disease occurred in 40 places in Kyonggi Province.
					
					 Poultry on more than 140 stock farms were massively culled and buried due to bird flu rapidly spreading in south Korea.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Action against Media Denounced by Koreans in China
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Action against Media Denounced by Koreans in China
Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China Thursday released a statement denouncing the south Korean authorities' fascist action against media.
					 Recently the south Korean Supreme Court forcibly shut down Jaju Minbo, a progressive internet paper, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 For the past 15 years since its founding Jaju Minbo has steered the patriotic campaign for social progress and reunification after setting it as its righteous purpose to "establish national spirit and aspire after reunification."
					
					 It had called for justice, truth, reunification and patriotism only in reflection of the public mindset.
					
					 Now that independent reunification is a supreme task of all Koreans, activities of Jaju Minbo should not be incriminated but be highly praised.
					
					 The action taken by the south Korean authorities against it is no more than an action against the nation and reunification.
					
					 All Koreans in China will never pardon the south Korean authorities as they persist in suppressing the pro-reunification organizations and personages through the mad-cap racket for eliminating the "followers of the north" and driving the north-south relations into a catastrophe.

articles.title: Organization of Koreans in China Denounces U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers for War Drills against DPRK
articles.content:
Organization of Koreans in China Denounces U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers for War Drills against DPRK
Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- The Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China Thursday issued a statement denouncing the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers for their provocative war drills against the DPRK.
					 The statement said that they kicked off key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills again in different parts of south Korea from March 2.
					
					 The association vehemently denounces the very dangerous nuclear war provocation aimed to bring a nuclear disaster to the Korean nation, the statement said.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean puppet forces should ponder over catastrophic consequences to be entailed by their anti-DPRK war moves and stop acting rashly, it noted, adding:
					
					 The aggressors and provocateurs would be well advised to understand that a shuddering destructive moment is drawing near.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills Blasted by Danish Organization
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills Blasted by Danish Organization
Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- The Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association made public a statement on March 2 in denunciation of the adventurous Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills kicked off by the U.S. imperialists and south Korean warmongers. 
					 The statement said:
					
					 A tense situation is again prevailing on the Korean peninsula due to the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises Key Resolve and Foal Eagle targeted against the DPRK. 
					
					 Key Resolve and Foal Eagle involving a huge quantity of latest war hardware are designed to carry out the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK to stifle it by force. 
					
					 Nuclear weapons and other WMDs are involved in the drills. 
					
					 We oppose the escalation of the tension on the Korean peninsula and strongly demand the U.S. and south Korean authorities stop at once the dangerous joint military exercises. 
					
					 The U.S. should stop confrontation and war moves against the DPRK. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities should not follow outside forces but opt for mending the north-south relations.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Nigerian Body on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Nigerian Body on Its Website
Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let the Entire Party, the Whole Army and All the People Conduct a Vigorous Forest Restoration Campaign to Cover the Mountains of the Country with Green Woods" was posted by the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on its website on Feb. 28.
					 The work, published on Feb. 26, Juche 104 (2015), says that forest restoration is a challenging and complicated undertaking and that it is a gigantic nature-remaking project to turn all the mountains of the country into "treasure mountains" and "gold mountains." 
					
					 The work also indicates the tasks and ways for creating and conserving forests.

articles.title: DPRK Introduced by Media of Brazil, Peru
articles.content:
DPRK Introduced by Media of Brazil, Peru
Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- The Masikryong Ski Resort and remodeled May Day Stadium were introduced in Brazil and Peru. 
					 The Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea on February 26 posted on its internet homepage an article illustrated with a photo of supreme leader Kim Jong Un going round the completed Masikryong Ski Resort. 
					
					 The article said that Kim Jong Un personally initiated the construction of the Masikryong Ski Resort to provide the people with a highly civilized life and gave the task to the Korean People's Army. 
					
					 Soldier-builders worked such miracle as winding up in a short span of time the large-scale construction project which would have required more than 10 years at an ordinary pace, it noted. 
					
					 Photos showing skiing courses and service facilities of the ski resort were posted on the homepage together with explanations. 
					
					 The Peruvian newspaper Correo on February 17 carried an article titled "Biggest stadium in DPRK was remodeled."
					
					 It said:
					
					 The May Day Stadium situated on picturesque Rungna Islet in Pyongyang was successfully remodeled last year. 
					
					The stadium built in 1989 has 150,000 seats.
					
					The stadium having a total plottage of 207,000 square meters hosted the grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang," the biggest event. A large number of performers presented the extravaganza, a successful combination of diverse background scenes, gymnastics, dances and acrobatics and unique lighting.

articles.title: Internet Meeting in Britain Denounces U.S. Crimes against Humanity
articles.content:
Internet Meeting in Britain Denounces U.S. Crimes against Humanity
Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- An internet meeting held on Feb. 26 in Britain denounced the U.S. crimes against humanity.
					 Among its participants were members of the New Communist Party of Britain, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK.
					
					 A resolution of the Korean Friendship Association UK addressed to the UN, the U.S. administration, various media and social organizations in Britain was adopted.
					
					 The resolution accused the U.S. of brutally massacring innocent Koreans by using a lot of germ and chemical weapons during the past Korean war.
					
					 Recalling that the U.S. has perpetrated ceaseless inhuman atrocities including torture, assassination and wire-tapping in various parts of the world, the resolution continued:
					
					 The U.S. is getting desperate in its anti-DPRK "human rights" conspiratorial racket after cooking up the non-existent "human rights issue" in the DPRK on the basis of false testimonies made by those who had fled it after committing crimes.
					
					 We strongly urge the UN Human Rights Council and other international bodies to make a perfect and accurate investigation into the U.S. crimes against humanity.
					
					 The UN should not toe the U.S. line but act fairly without prejudice.

articles.title: Opera en RPDC el bus de turismo hacia el campo de esqui Masikryong
articles.content:
Opera en RPDC el bus de turismo hacia el campo de esqui Masikryong
Pyongyang, 7 de marzo (ACNC) -- Circula en Corea el autobus de turismo para los visitantes al campo de esqui Masikryong, construido magnificamente en la zona montanosa de la provincia de Kangwon.
					Segun un funcionario, los autobuses Pyongyang-Masikryong y Wonsan-Masikryong operan normalmente una vez a cada dos dias desde enero.
					
					La operacion de esos vehiculos aumenta la popularidad de esa base de turismo deportivo.
					
					En ese lugar los turistas pueden practicar deportes invernales como esqui, patin, moto de esqui y trineo y probar los platos tipicos locales y los otros famosos del mundo.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun llama a manifestar impetu revolucionario de mujeres coreanas
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun llama a manifestar impetu revolucionario de mujeres coreanas
Pyongyang, 7 de marzo (ACNC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun inserto este sabado un articulo individual dedicado al dia de publicacion de la obra del Dirigente Kim Jong Il "Las mujeres son las poderosas fuerzas que impulsan la revolucion y la construccion".
					La obra fue publicada el 8 de marzo del 84 (1995) de la Era Juche. 
					
					Durante 20 anos pasados, bajo la energica orientacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, se han elevado extraordinariamente la posicion y el papel de las mujeres coreanas como poderosas fuerzas de la construccion de un Estado prospero y manifestado a todo el mundo los hermosos rasgos y el impetu revolucionario de ellas, adelanta el articulo y continua:
					
					Hoy dia, el autoctono movimiento femenino de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea acoge la era dorada de su desarrollo gracias a la guia del Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					La tradicion de fidelidad, la de defensa a ultranza al lider, iniciadas en la selva del monte Paektu, se ponen de pleno manifiesto en la marcha de hoy por la victoria final de la construccion de un Estado prospero. 
					
					La patria no olvida los esfuerzos de las mujeres coreanas que en el periodo de la marcha penosa, la forzada, atendieron con afecto a sus familias e hijos superando con risas todas las dificultades. 
					
					El aspecto apasionado y firme y los esfuerzos abnegados de las mujeres fueron el factor que mantuvo la armonia de la sociedad. 
					
					Gracias a las mujeres que dedican todo lo suyo por la sociedad, el colectivo y la gran familia socialista, la patria pudo avanzar siempre con vigor superando las dificultades y penas de toda indole. 
					
					El Partido del Trabajo de Corea deposita gran esperanza en las mujeres y es muy importante el papel que asumen ellas en adelantar el futuro de la patria prospera. 
					
					Todas las mujeres deben unirse monoliticamente en torno al Mariscal Kim Jong Un y mostrar su espiritu revolucionario en la marcha general por edificar un Estado prospero.

articles.title: Entidad de coreanos en China condena Key Resolve y Foal Eagle
articles.content:
Entidad de coreanos en China condena Key Resolve y Foal Eagle
Pyongyang, 7 de marzo (ACNC) -- La asociacion regional en Zhongnan de la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en China hizo publica el dia 5 una declaracion que condena los ejercicios de guerra anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea que libran el imperialismo estadounidense y los titeres surcoreanos.
					El documento denuncia que el imperialismo norteamericano, enemigo jurado, y los titeres surcoreanos comenzaron otra vez desde el dia 2 en todo el territorio surcoreano el simulacro militar conjunto Key Resolve y Foal Eagle.
					
					Subraya que la asociacion condena categoricamente esas maniobras extremadamente peligrosas que pretenden imponer los desastres nucleares a la nacion coreana.
					
					Prosigue que el pueblo coreano, que cuenta con excelentes lideres de generacion en generacion, es guiado por otro gran hombre del monte Paektu quien practica autoctonos metodos de combate no conocidos por la historia de la humanidad.
					
					Apunta que el pueblo coreano posee el indoblegable poderio espiritual, la ideologia y voluntad que no puede tener ni imitar el imperialismo norteamericano.
					
					Recalca que Estados Unidos y los titeres surcoreanos deben actuar con prudencia pensando con seriedad en las consecuencias catastroficas que traeran sus maniobras de guerra anti-RPDC.
					
					Advierte a los agresores y provocadores que se acerca el momento de su arruinamiento horrible.
